ear.title: Ear Piercing Care
instructions: Sleep on a travel pillow to avoid pressure
redFlags: Extreme swelling spreading to the cheek
Yellow or green discharge with foul odor

nose.title: Nose Piercing Care
instructions: Spray saline solution on the outside
Gently clean inside with a saline-soaked swab
Be careful when blowing your nose
redFlags: Bump forming near the entry point

lip.title: Lip Piercing Care
instructions: Rinse with alcohol-free mouthwash after eating
Clean the outside with saline 2x daily
Brush teeth gently to avoid catching jewelry
Avoid spicy or acidic foods for 2 weeks

navel.title: Navel Piercing Care
instructions: Do not submerge in pools/hot tubs
